'use strict';

const React = require('react');

const {Picker, Text, View} = require('react-native');

class TextLegend extends React.Component<*, *> {
  state: {|
    alignment: $TEMPORARY$string<'left'>,
    fontSize: number,
    language: $TEMPORARY$string<'english'>,
    textMetrics: Array<any>,
  |} = {
    textMetrics: [],
    language: 'english',
    alignment: 'left',
    fontSize: 50,
  };

  render(): React.Node {
    const PANGRAMS = {
      arabic:
        'ØµÙÙ Ø®ÙÙ„Ù‚Ù Ø®ÙÙˆØ¯Ù ÙƒÙÙ…ÙØ«Ù„Ù Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙÙ…Ø³Ù Ø¥ÙØ° Ø¨ÙØ²ÙØºÙØª â€” ÙŠÙØ­Ø¸Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ø¶ÙØ¬ÙŠØ¹Ù Ø¨ÙÙ‡Ø§ Ù†ÙØ¬Ù„Ø§Ø¡Ù Ù…ÙØ¹Ø·Ø§Ø±Ù',
      chinese: 'Innovation in China ä¸­å›½æ™ºé€ ï¼Œæ…§åŠå…¨çƒ 0123456789',
      english: 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.',
      emoji: 'ğŸ™ğŸ¾ğŸš—ğŸ’©ğŸ˜ğŸ¤¯ğŸ‘©ğŸ½â€ğŸ”§ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ğŸ’¯',
      german: 'Falsches Ãœben von Xylophonmusik quÃ¤lt jeden grÃ¶ÃŸeren Zwerg',
      greek: 'Î¤Î±Ï‡Î¯ÏƒÏ„Î· Î±Î»ÏÏ€Î·Î¾ Î²Î±Ï†Î®Ï‚ ÏˆÎ·Î¼Î­Î½Î· Î³Î·, Î´ÏÎ±ÏƒÎºÎµÎ»Î¯Î¶ÎµÎ¹ Ï…Ï€Î­Ï Î½Ï‰Î¸ÏÎ¿Ï ÎºÏ…Î½ÏŒÏ‚',
      hebrew: '×“×’ ×¡×§×¨×Ÿ ×©×˜ ×‘×™× ×××•×›×–×‘ ×•×œ×¤×ª×¢ ××¦× ×—×‘×¨×”',
      hindi:
        'à¤‹à¤·à¤¿à¤¯à¥‹à¤‚ à¤•à¥‹ à¤¸à¤¤à¤¾à¤¨à¥‡ à¤µà¤¾à¤²à¥‡ à¤¦à¥à¤·à¥à¤Ÿ à¤°à¤¾à¤•à¥à¤·à¤¸à¥‹à¤‚ à¤•à¥‡ à¤°à¤¾à¤œà¤¾ à¤°à¤¾à¤µà¤£ à¤•à¤¾ à¤¸à¤°à¥à¤µà¤¨à¤¾à¤¶ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¥‡ à¤µà¤¾à¤²à¥‡ à¤µà¤¿à¤·à¥à¤£à¥à¤µà¤¤à¤¾à¤° à¤­à¤—à¤µà¤¾à¤¨ à¤¶à¥à¤°à¥€à¤°à¤¾à¤®, à¤…à¤¯à¥‹à¤§à¥à¤¯à¤¾ à¤•à¥‡ à¤®à¤¹à¤¾à¤°à¤¾à¤œ à¤¦à¤¶à¤°à¤¥ à¤•à¥‡ à¤¬à¤¡à¤¼à¥‡ à¤¸à¤ªà¥à¤¤à¥à¤° à¤¥à¥‡à¥¤',
      igbo:
        'Nne, nna, wepá»¥ heâ€™lâ€™á»¥já» dum nâ€™ime á»zá»¥zá»¥ á»¥má»¥, vufesi obi nye Chukwu, á¹…á»¥rá»‹aná»¥, gbaká»á»ná»¥ kpaa, kwee ya ka o guzoshie ike; á» ghaghá»‹ ito, nwapá»¥ta ezi agwa',
      irish:
        'Dâ€™fhuascail Ãosa Ãšrmhac na hÃ“ighe Beannaithe pÃ³r Ã‰ava agus Ãdhaimh',
      japanese:
        'è‰²ã¯åŒ‚ã¸ã© æ•£ã‚Šã¬ã‚‹ã‚’ æˆ‘ãŒä¸–èª°ã å¸¸ãªã‚‰ã‚€ æœ‰ç‚ºã®å¥¥å±± ä»Šæ—¥è¶Šãˆã¦ æµ…ãå¤¢è¦‹ã˜ é…”ã²ã‚‚ã›ãš',
      korean:
        'í‚¤ìŠ¤ì˜ ê³ ìœ ì¡°ê±´ì€ ì…ìˆ ë¼ë¦¬ ë§Œë‚˜ì•¼ í•˜ê³  íŠ¹ë³„í•œ ê¸°ìˆ ì€ í•„ìš”ì¹˜ ì•Šë‹¤',
      norwegian:
        'VÃ¥r sÃ¦re Zulu fra badeÃ¸ya spilte jo whist og quickstep i min taxi.',
      polish: 'JeÅ¼u klÄ…tw, spÅ‚Ã³dÅº Finom czÄ™Å›Ä‡ gry haÅ„b!',
      romanian: 'MuzicologÄƒ Ã®n bej vÃ¢nd whisky È™i tequila, preÈ› fix.',
      russian: 'Ğ­Ñ…, Ñ‡ÑƒĞ¶Ğ°Ğº, Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑÑŠÑ‘Ğ¼ Ñ†ĞµĞ½ ÑˆĞ»ÑĞ¿ (ÑÑ„Ñ‚ÑŒ) â€“ Ğ²Ğ´Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ·Ğ³!',
      swedish: 'Yxskaftbud, ge vÃ¥r WC-zonmÃ¶ IQ-hjÃ¤lp.',
      thai:
        'à¹€à¸›à¹‡à¸™à¸¡à¸™à¸¸à¸©à¸¢à¹Œà¸ªà¸¸à¸”à¸›à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸ªà¸£à¸´à¸à¹€à¸¥à¸´à¸¨à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¸„à¹ˆà¸² à¸à¸§à¹ˆà¸²à¸šà¸£à¸£à¸”à¸²à¸à¸¹à¸‡à¸ªà¸±à¸•à¸§à¹Œà¹€à¸”à¸£à¸±à¸ˆà¸‰à¸²à¸™ à¸ˆà¸‡à¸à¹ˆà¸²à¸Ÿà¸±à¸™à¸à¸±à¸’à¸™à¸²à¸§à¸´à¸Šà¸²à¸à¸²à¸£ à¸­à¸¢à¹ˆà¸²à¸¥à¹‰à¸²à¸‡à¸œà¸¥à¸²à¸à¸¤à¹…à¹€à¸‚à¹ˆà¸™à¸†à¹ˆà¸²à¸šà¸µà¸‘à¸²à¹ƒà¸„à¸£ à¹„à¸¡à¹ˆà¸–à¸·à¸­à¹‚à¸—à¸©à¹‚à¸à¸£à¸˜à¹à¸Šà¹ˆà¸‡à¸‹à¸±à¸”à¸®à¸¶à¸”à¸®à¸±à¸”à¸”à¹ˆà¸² à¸«à¸±à¸”à¸­à¸ à¸±à¸¢à¹€à¸«à¸¡à¸·à¸­à¸™à¸à¸µà¸¬à¸²à¸­à¸±à¸Šà¸Œà¸²à¸ªà¸±à¸¢ à¸›à¸à¸´à¸šà¸±à¸•à¸´à¸›à¸£à¸°à¸à¸¤à¸•à¸´à¸à¸à¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹ƒà¸ˆ à¸à¸¹à¸”à¸ˆà¸²à¹ƒà¸«à¹‰à¸ˆà¹Šà¸°à¹† à¸ˆà¹‹à¸²à¹† à¸™à¹ˆà¸²à¸Ÿà¸±à¸‡à¹€à¸­à¸¢à¸¯',
    };
    return (
      <View>
        <Text
          onPress={() =>
            this.setState(prevState => ({fontSize: prevState.fontSize + 3}))
          }>
          Increase size
        </Text>
        <Text
          onPress={() =>
            this.setState(prevState => ({fontSize: prevState.fontSize - 3}))
          }>
          Decrease size
        </Text>
        <Picker
          selectedValue={this.state.language}
          onValueChange={itemValue => this.setState({language: itemValue})}>
          {Object.keys(PANGRAMS).map(x => (
            <Picker.Item
              label={x[0].toUpperCase() + x.substring(1)}
              key={x}
              value={x}
            />
          ))}
        </Picker>
        <View>
          {this.state.textMetrics.map(
            ({
              x,
              y,
              width,
              height,
              capHeight,
              ascender,
              descender,
              xHeight,
            }) => {
              return [
                <View
                  key="baseline view"
                  style={{
                    top: y + ascender,
                    height: 1,
                    left: 0,
                    right: 0,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    backgroundColor: 'red',
                  }}
                />,
                <Text
                  key="baseline text"
                  style={{
                    top: y + ascender,
                    right: 0,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    color: 'red',
                  }}>
                  Baseline
                </Text>,
                <View
                  key="capheight view"
                  style={{
                    top: y + ascender - capHeight,
                    height: 1,
                    left: 0,
                    right: 0,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    backgroundColor: 'green',
                  }}
                />,
                <Text
                  key="capheight text"
                  style={{
                    top: y + ascender - capHeight,
                    right: 0,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    color: 'green',
                  }}>
                  Capheight
                </Text>,
                <View
                  key="xheight view"
                  style={{
                    top: y + ascender - xHeight,
                    height: 1,
                    left: 0,
                    right: 0,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    backgroundColor: 'blue',
                  }}
                />,
                <Text
                  key="xheight text"
                  style={{
                    top: y + ascender - xHeight,
                    right: 0,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    color: 'blue',
                  }}>
                  X-height
                </Text>,
                <View
                  key="descender view"
                  style={{
                    top: y + ascender + descender,
                    height: 1,
                    left: 0,
                    right: 0,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    backgroundColor: 'orange',
                  }}
                />,
                <Text
                  key="descender text"
                  style={{
                    top: y + ascender + descender,
                    right: 0,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    color: 'orange',
                  }}>
                  Descender
                </Text>,
                <View
                  key="end of text view"
                  style={{
                    top: y,
                    height: height,
                    width: 1,
                    left: x + width,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    backgroundColor: 'brown',
                  }}
                />,
                <Text
                  key="end of text text"
                  style={{
                    top: y,
                    left: x + width + 5,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    color: 'brown',
                  }}>
                  End of text
                </Text>,
                <View
                  key="start of text view"
                  style={{
                    top: y,
                    height: height,
                    width: 1,
                    left: x,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    backgroundColor: 'brown',
                  }}
                />,
                <Text
                  key="start of text text"
                  style={{
                    top: y,
                    left: x + 5,
                    position: 'absolute',
                    color: 'brown',
                  }}>
                  Start of text
                </Text>,
              ];
            },
          )}
          <Text
            onTextLayout={event => {
              this.setState({textMetrics: event.nativeEvent.lines});
            }}
            style={{
              fontSize: this.state.fontSize,
              textAlign: this.state.alignment,
            }}>
            {PANGRAMS[this.state.language]}
          </Text>
        </View>
        <Picker
          selectedValue={this.state.alignment}
          onValueChange={itemValue => this.setState({alignment: itemValue})}>
          <Picker.Item label="Left align" value="left" />
          <Picker.Item label="Center align" value="center" />
          <Picker.Item label="Right align" value="right" />
        </Picker>
      </View>
    );
  }
}
module.exports = TextLegend;
